text: The Descent is a 2005 British adventure horror thriller movie written and directed by Neil Marshall. The movie follows six women who, having entered a cave system, struggle to survive against the humanoid creatures inside. The Descent opened in cinemas in the United Kingdom on 8 July 2005. It premiered in the 2006 Sundance Film Festival and released on 4 August 2006 in the United States. The movie received positive reviews. ==References== Category:2005 horror movies Category:2005 thriller movies Category:2005 adventure movies Category:British horror movies Category:British thriller movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Neil Marshall
title: The Descent
